d1_flags: 2. goto C7C588 if BUZZ_BUZZ_DYING_ON_FLOOR is cleared
d1_text:
Npc0046:
[LOAD_FLAG BUZZ_BUZZ_DYING_ON_FLOOR][GOTO_IF_FALSE L_C7C588]
[CREATE_NPC_EMOTE 46 EXCLAMATION]
[PAUSE 60][DELETE_NPC_EMOTE 46]
[GET_DIR_FROM_PMEMBER NESS NPC 46][SET_PMEMBER_DIR NESS 0]
[STOP_MUSIC]
[OPEN_TBOX 1]
ï¿½Agh![PAUSE 15] *Gasp*[PAUSE 30][LINE_BREAK]
  I was...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½...much weaker than I thought...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½So you must now begin your adventure...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½see...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½you...[HALT][CLOSE_ALL_TBOXES]
[PAUSE 60][LINE_BREAK]
[PAUSE 60][LINE_BREAK]
[OPEN_TBOX 1]
ï¿½Oh,[PAUSE 15] I just remembered...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Listen to my final words...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
[PAUSE 60][LINE_BREAK]
[PAUSE 60][LINE_BREAK]
[PLAY_MUSIC 119]
; $C5F2AD
L_C5F2AD:
ï¿½To defeat Giygas, your own power must unite with the Earth's...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½the Earth will then channel your power and multiply it...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½There are eight points that you must visit.[PAUSE 20]  Make these places your own...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Each of these locations is ï¿½Your Sanctuary.ï¿½[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½One of them is near Onett.[PAUSE 20]  It is called ï¿½Giant Step.ï¿½[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Go there first...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Do you understand?[LINE_BREAK]
[LOAD_STRING "Yes"]
 [LOAD_STRING "No"]
[PRINT_STRINGS_HORZ 2]
[CREATE_MENU]
[CLEAR_LINE]
[MULTI_GOTO L_C5F3D2 L_C5F39D]
; $C5F39D
L_C5F39D:
ï¿½...I see.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I apologize.[PAUSE 20]  I guess I didn't explain it well enough...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
[GOTO L_C5F2AD]
; $C5F3D2
L_C5F3D2:
ï¿½All right.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½You are a very intelligent young man...[PAUSE 15] and...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Oh![PAUSE 15]  The pain!...[PAUSE 20] Everything is getting dark...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½urgh!...[PAUSE 15] *Gasp*...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Before I pass on,[PAUSE 15] I want to give you something...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½It is the Sound Stone.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½You can record the melodies from the eight ï¿½Your Sanctuaryï¿½ locations[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½into this stone.[PAUSE 20]  It is an awesome item...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½By the way...[PAUSE 15] I'm almost gone,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½but did you want to hear the story one more time?[LINE_BREAK]
[LOAD_STRING "Yes"]
 [LOAD_STRING "No"]
[PRINT_STRINGS_HORZ 2]
[CREATE_MENU]
[CLEAR_LINE]
[MULTI_GOTO L_C5F564 L_C5F4F4]
; $C5F4F4
L_C5F4F4:
ï¿½Good![WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
[INV_HAS_SPACE ANY][GOTO_IF_FALSE L_C5F575]
ï¿½It's already dawn outside...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½But it doesn't matter to me.[PAUSE 20]  I'm fading fast...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Argh![PAUSE 15] *Gasp*[WAIT][GIVE_ITEM_RETURN_SLOT REG_RESULT SOUND_STONE]
[GOSUB L_C7DCB6]
[HALT]; $C5F551
L_C5F551:
[CLOSE_ALL_TBOXES]
[PAUSE 1][SET_NPC_MOVEMENT_SCRIPT 46 635]
[CLR_FLAG BUZZ_BUZZ_DYING_ON_FLOOR]
[DISABLE_HOTSPOT 1]
[RESTORE_MUSIC]
[END]
